00516 // Outcommented because
00517 // a) it doesn't compile on 64-bit currently
00518 // b) anyone enabling it should be aware that S3TC compression algorithm which might be used in that loader
00519 // is patented in the US by S3 and they do collect license fees when it's used in applications.
00520 // So if you are unfortunate enough to develop applications for US market and their broken patent system be careful.
00521 // #define _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_DDS_LOADER_

00671 
00672 // Some cleanup and standard stuff
00673 
00674 #ifdef _IRR_WINDOWS_API_
00675 
00676 // To build Irrlicht as a static library, you must define _IRR_STATIC_LIB_ in both the
00677 // Irrlicht build, *and* in the user application, before #including <irrlicht.h>
00678 #ifndef _IRR_STATIC_LIB_
00679 #ifdef IRRLICHT_EXPORTS
00680 #define IRRLICHT_API __declspec(dllexport)
00681 #else
00682 #define IRRLICHT_API __declspec(dllimport)
00683 #endif // IRRLICHT_EXPORT
00684 #else
00685 #define IRRLICHT_API
00686 #endif // _IRR_STATIC_LIB_
00687 
00688 // Declare the calling convention.
00689 #if defined(_STDCALL_SUPPORTED)
00690 #define IRRCALLCONV __stdcall
00691 #else
00692 #define IRRCALLCONV __cdecl
00693 #endif // STDCALL_SUPPORTED
00694 
00695 #else // _IRR_WINDOWS_API_
00696 
00697 // Force symbol export in shared libraries built with gcc.
00698 #if (__GNUC__ >= 4) && !defined(_IRR_STATIC_LIB_) && defined(IRRLICHT_EXPORTS)
00699 #define IRRLICHT_API __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00700 #else
00701 #define IRRLICHT_API
00702 #endif
00703 
00704 #define IRRCALLCONV
00705 
00706 #endif // _IRR_WINDOWS_API_
00707 
00708 // We need to disable DIRECT3D9 support for Visual Studio 6.0 because
00709 // those $%&$!! disabled support for it since Dec. 2004 and users are complaining
00710 // about linker errors. Comment this out only if you are knowing what you are
00711 // doing. (Which means you have an old DX9 SDK and VisualStudio6).
00712 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00713 #if (_MSC_VER < 1300 && !defined(__GNUC__))
00714 #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_DIRECT3D_9_
00715 #pragma message("Compiling Irrlicht with Visual Studio 6.0, support for DX9 is disabled.")
00716 #endif
00717 #endif
00718 
00719 // XBox does not have OpenGL or DirectX9
00720 #if defined(_IRR_XBOX_PLATFORM_)
00721     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_OPENGL_
00722     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_DIRECT3D_9_
00723 #endif
00724 
00726 #if defined(_WIN32_WCE)
00727     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_OPENGL_
00728     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_DIRECT3D_8_
00729     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_DIRECT3D_9_
00730

00734     #define BURNINGVIDEO_RENDERER_CE
00735 
00736     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_WINDOWS_DEVICE_
00737     #define _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_WINDOWS_CE_DEVICE_
00738     //#define _IRR_WCHAR_FILESYSTEM
00739 
00740     #undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_IRR_MESH_LOADER_
00741     //#undef _IRR_COMPILE_WITH_MD2_LOADER_
